did.unittitle: J. E. Cooley [New York] Advertising Broadside, 1863
did.physdesc: This collection has been digitized and is available online.
did.abstract: Single-page advertising flyer and price list for J. E. Cooley, grocer, New York, NY, dated 1863.

userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from [Enter collection title] must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: J. E. Cooley (New York) Advertising Broadside, Ms2012-007, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased by Special Collections in February 2012.

altformavail.head: Alternate Form Available
altformavail.p: Letters and any available transcripts have been digitized and are available online.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the J. E. Cooley (New York) Advertising Broadside was completed in May 2012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Single-page advertising flyer for J. E. Cooley, merchant, New York, NY, dated 1863. Flyer lists prices for a wide range of grocery items, including cheese, butter, fruits, grains, poultry and "sundries." Prices are handwritten alongside item listings.
